document_data.name: Pressbow Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Pressbow Lane ''' was a street in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This road ran from north to south, stretching between [[Shrimp Alley]] and [[Net Street (south)|Net Street]]. From the northeast it was met by [[Snail Street]].
document_data.History: This road was named for the [[pressbow]], a type of factory machine.{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2012)/What is a Pressbow?}}
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Coopers' Rest]], the guildhall of the [[Coopers' Guild]].
* The [[Hanged Man (Waterdeep)|Hanged Man]], a tavern on the corner of Pressbow Lane and Net Street.
* [[Jesters' Clubhouse]], the guildhall of the [[Jesters' Guild]].<ref>{{Cite comic/Night of the Moonpenguin|25}}
* The [[Sleeping Wench]], a tavern on the corner of Pressbow Lane and Snail Street.
* The workshop of the leatherworker [[Albryn Telnhand]], disputed inventor of the pressbow.
